lead_paragraph: When hothead Steve's girlfriend Sam commits suicide after being raped by a gang of skinheads, Steve becomes determined to infiltrate the gang and exact revenge. Once on the inside, Steve faces head on the paranoid and brutual world of a culture driven by hatred and alienation.
